de.esoco.process.ui.composite

Class UiThumbnail

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.process.param.ParameterWrapper<T,C>
        • de.esoco.process.ui.UiComponent<java.util.List<org.obrel.core.RelationType<?>>,C>
          • de.esoco.process.ui.UiContainer<C>
            • de.esoco.process.ui.UiComposite<UiThumbnail>
              • de.esoco.process.ui.composite.UiThumbnail
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.obrel.core.Relatable

    public class UiThumbnail
extends UiComposite<UiThumbnail>
    A composite that display an small image that on click events opens a view that displays the full-size image. If a caption label has been set on the image it will be used as the title of the full-size view.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class de.esoco.process.ui.UiContainer

        UiContainer.UiContainerFragment

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UiThumbnail(UiContainer<?> rParent, UiImageDefinition<?> rImage)
      Creates a new instance that displays a down-scaled image as the thumbnail with a default width of 300 pixels.
      UiThumbnail(UiContainer<?> rParent, UiImageDefinition<?> rThumbImage, UiImageDefinition<?> rFullImage)
      Creates a new instance that displays a thumbnail with a default width of 300 pixels.

      • setImage

        public void setImage(UiImageDefinition<?> rImage)

        Parameters:
        rImage - The component's image.
